backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required mobile layout updates for BenefitsSection.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites and steps for publishing the site to IC mainnet, including required gallery assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up metadata, fonts, favicon, and loading the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component composing header and all content sections in order.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Empty footer component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Fixed header with smooth-scroll navigation, mobile menu, and asset-safe logo loading.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutCa: About section showing four capability cards with icons and descriptive text.
frontend/src/components/sections/Benefit: Benefits section rendering four advantage cards with mobile-first typography and grid layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/Collect: Collections section displaying four carpet categories with randomly selected thumbnails and feature tags.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders a contact section with cards for phone, email, and location plus CTA buttons using CONTACT config.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Displays a filterable gallery of categorized images with modal preview and error handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Shows a hero banner with background image and buttons that scroll to gallery or contact sections.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Exports contact details including phone, email, and location links used across the site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading, login, logout, and identity management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Builds encoded public asset URLs respecting base path and handling special characters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom theme extensions (colors, fonts, animations), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, including schema version, project summary, existing features, and a pending mobile layout adjustment request.
